div.p: Effects of meeting Paris Agreement targets (1.5°C warming) on FRs relative to 3.5°C warming due to ( A) changes in MCP, ( B) changes in price as a result of changes in supply, and ( C) net change to FRs from combined quantity and price effects. Projections are relative to the 2001–2010 period. Similar figures for other economic indicators are given in fig. S1.
